title: Oto no Nai Ame wa Furitsuzuku
original_name: 音のない雨は降り続く
sinopse:
Akira's mother was the mistress of a CEO. Upon her death, the CEO takes Akira and his little brother into the family, but now Akira must deal with his new relatives and the president of one of his father's companies.
(Source: MU)
